citeinfo.origin: Metropolitan Council - Metropolitan Transportation Services (Metro Mobility)
citeinfo.title: Metro Mobility Americans with Diabilities Act (ADA) Service Provider Areas

descript.abstract:
This layer represents the demand responsive services (Dial-a-Ride) provided for the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) by Metro Mobility.
Dial-a-ride service for the general public is available through the Transit Link Dial-a-Ride program. (see Transit Link Dial-a-Ride Service Areas)
ADA service areas are defined by complete cities or townships.
descript.purpose: The pupose of the is layer is to show the service provder areas boundaries. Metro Mobility dispatchers use this layer when making reservations with customers.
descript.supplinf: Twin Cities 7 county metropolitan area. This includes the counties of Anoka, Carver, Dakota, Hennepin, Ramsey, Scott Twin Cities 7 county metropolitan area. This includes the counties of Anoka, Carver, Dakota, Hennepin, Ramsey, Scott and Washington.

timeperd.current:
Service Provider Area boundaries are defined by municipality and effective starting on 8/30/2015
Updates to this data since then reflect only minor updates to municipal boundaries, reflected in the Time Period of Content.

theme.themekey: Transportation, Transit Services, Metro Mobility, Senior Transportation, Dial-a-ride, demand response

place.placekey: Twin Cities, Anoka County, Carver County, Dakota County, Hennepin County, Ramsey County, Scott County, Washington County

citeinfo.title: Counties and Cities & Townships, Twin Cities Metropolitan Area

attracc.attraccr: Attributes provided by MTS Metro Mobility staff. Eash Sevice Provider Area was defined by a list of municipalities. Each service area is served by 1 provider designated by Metro Mobility.

dataqual.complete: 7 County Metropolitan Area of the Twin Cities. (Anoka, Carver, Dakota, Hennepin, Ramsey, Scott, and Washington Counties)

horizpa.horizpar: Because this dataset is derived directly from the MetroGIS regional municipal boundary layer, it's positional accuracy is identical to that dataset.

procstep.procdesc: This layer was created by Metro Mobility staff identifying the municipalities that are served by each service provider. The layer is created by relating the COCTU Lookup Table to the current municpal boundary layer and dissolving on the METMO_SA field, then adding the Provider field with the current provider names. This layer is updated quarterly to reflect the most current municipal boundaries.

spdoinfo.indspref: COCTU_CODE: 8 digit code that is a concatenation of the 3-digit FIPS county code and 5-digit FIPS place code
spdoinfo.mgmg3til: One file for entire Twin Cities Metropolitan Area

overview.eaover:
METMO_SA - Metro Mobility ADA Service Provider Area Name: - Metro East - Metro South - Metro West
Provider - Metro Mobility Service Provider Name
Phone - Metro Mobility Service Provider Phone Number
TTY - Metro Mobility Service Provide TTY Phone Number

If you transmit or provide the GIS Data (or any portion of it) to another user, it is recommended that the GIS Data include a copy of this disclaimer and this metadata.
